snippet.title: 6 Fun Ways You Can Die In Noita | Noita Impressions
snippet.description:
Astrid keeps getting killed in Noita in a variety of gruesome, fascinating, and ultimately quite funny ways. So, instead of just telling you what Noita does and how it works, here she is to tell you some fun ways to die, and you’ll no doubt learn a thing or two about the game along the way. Enjoy these violent Nouta impressions.

This is the Noita early access version, but even this early in development you’ll come to see just how intricately “every pixel is simulated” in the roguelike. There’s sand and dust that have physics, you can get soaked in different liquids, and fire will even bellow out smoke that acts as an actual object in-game. As you’ll see in this Noita gameplay, that smoke can actually kill you via suffocation.

This is the Noita steam release, but developers Nolla Games have also made sure that you’ll also be able to pick the game up on the Humble Store, itch.io, and GOG. This Noita test was using an Nvidia GTX 1660 graphics card, and that seems to pretty easily handle all of that pixel simulating.

If you enjoyed this Noita impressions video you could give it a like, and subscribe to Rock Paper Shotgun while you’re at it to see more stuff like it. Recently, Matthew did a review of futuristic souls-like The Surge 2 here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6RUShSYYJXw and Alice gave her early access verdict on floating city builder Flotsam here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hltK3zXecKQ&t=5s

#Noita #NoitaImpressions #FunWaysToDie
